common.title: InterAI
common.subtitle: Professional conversation with AI interviewer
common.disclaimer: Using this website for AI interview practice does not guarantee that you will pass actual interviews or receive job offers.

welcome.title: Ready to Start Interview
welcome.description: Click the button below to start a conversation with the AI interviewer

realtime.title: Real-time Feedback
realtime.description: Get instant interview feedback and suggestions

multilang.title: Multi-language Support
multilang.description: Supports Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: All conversation records are saved locally only

step1.title: Start Interview
step1.description: Click the start button to begin

step2.title: Answer Questions
step2.description: Respond to the AI interviewer's questions

step3.title: Get Feedback
step3.description: Receive professional interview feedback in real-time

step4.title: Finish Interview
step4.description: Click the finish button to end the interview

tips.title: Preparation Tips
tips.tip4: You can use quick questions feature anytime

q1.question: How to finish the interview?
q1.answer: Click the "Finish Interview" button in the top right corner. The system will automatically clear conversation records after 10 seconds.

q2.question: Will conversation records be saved?
q2.answer: All conversation records are only saved in your local browser and will not be uploaded to any server.

q3.question: How long do I need to wait before starting a new interview?
q3.answer: After completing an interview, the system will start a 24-hour countdown timer. During this period, AI is preparing your resume, and you need to wait until the countdown ends before starting a new interview.

q4.question: What languages are supported?
q4.answer: Currently supports Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean.

q5.question: Is this a paid service?
q5.answer: This service is completely free. All features are available without any payment.

chat.inputPlaceholder: Enter your answer... (Shift+Enter for new line)

quickQuestions.title: Quick Questions
quickQuestions.interviewProcess: What stages does the interview process include?
quickQuestions.technicalStack: What is the technical stack for this position?
quickQuestions.teamStructure: What is the size and structure of the team?
quickQuestions.workContent: What are the main responsibilities of this position?

error.general: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.

interview.welcome: Hello! Welcome to the interview. I'm your interviewer, let's begin. Please briefly introduce yourself, including your technical background and relevant experience.
interview.privacy:
**Privacy Policy:**
When using this system, all conversation records are only saved on your local system and will not be uploaded to any server or third-party service. Your personal information and interview content will be kept completely confidential.
interview.finishInfo:
**Finish Interview:**
When you have completed the interview, you can click the "Finish Interview" button in the top right corner. The system will automatically delete all conversation records after 10 seconds and return to the homepage.

confirm.title: Confirm Return
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to end the current interview and return?

section1.title: Interview Process
section1.content: The interview will be conducted by an AI interviewer. Please answer questions honestly. You can use the quick questions feature at any time during the interview to get more information.

section2.title: Privacy Protection
section2.content: All conversation records are only saved in your local browser and will not be uploaded to any server. Your personal information and interview content will be kept completely confidential.

section3.title: Finish Interview
section3.content: When you have completed the interview, you can click the "Finish Interview" button in the top right corner. The system will automatically delete all conversation records after 10 seconds and return to the homepage. After completing an interview, you need to wait 24 hours before starting a new interview.
